steps.name: Creating Inwarranty Job with Create Job API
Setting up the BaseURi, Content Type as Application/JSON and attaching the Sensitive Data Filter for role and attaching payload
Getting the Property Value from the config file
Getting the Auth token for the role

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.value: CreateJobPayload[mst_service_location_id=1, mst_platform_id=2, mst_warrenty_status_id=1, mst_oem_id=1, customer=Customer[first_name=Jatin, last_name=Sharma, mobile_number=7293847564, mobile_number_alt=, email_id=jatin@gmail.com, email_id_alt=], customer_address=CustomerAddress[flat_number=D404, apartment_name=Vasant galaxy, street_name=Bangur, landmark=Inorbit, area=Mumbai, pincode=411039, country=INDIA, state=MAHARASHTRA], customer_product=CustomerProduct[dop=2026-02-09T16:10:14.213876871Z, serial_number=19700432156456, imei1=19700432156456, imei2=19700432156456, popurl=2026-02-09T16:10:14.213976337Z, product_id=1, mst_model_id=1], problems=[Problems[id=1, remark=Battery Issue]]]

parameters.name: createJobPayload

steps.name: Expecting the response to have Content Type as Application/JSON, Statuc 200 and Response time is less than 2000 ms

labels.name: story
labels.value: FD should be able to create job
